1359210.name: Fantasy Grounds - Reach Adventure 5: The Borderland Run
1359210.description:
Reach Adventure 5: The Borderland Run

A simple delivery job in the Trojan Reach will bring the Travellers into direct conflict with the Aslan.
In
The Borderland Run the Travellers are engaged to pick up a cargo from a remote outsystem world and convey it to the starport at the Aslan world of Tyokh; a simple enough delivery job, with the chance to engage in a little speculative trading along the way. However, there are those who do not want the cargo to be delivered... and the cargo agrees with them.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Harald Budschedl
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Traveller 2E (Mongoose) ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
